channel.title: Calculators on Checklists
channel.description: Recent content in Calculators on Checklists

item.title: Nutrition Calculators
item.description: Ideal weight Calculate the ideal weight, based on the formula 48,4 + 77 * (height - 150 cm) (German Society for Nutrition). The conversion to lb uses the factor 1 kg = 2.2 lb. height (cm) weight (kg) weight (lb) Calculates the ideal weight, based on the Devine formula 50 kg (female 45.5 kg) + 0.9 kg * (height - 152 cm). The conversion to lb uses the factor 1 kg = 2.
